EmailTemplate.name: SGT-IA007_April24-25_2012.Confirmation Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: Sweet Software Group Training in Ankeny, IA Next Week
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
REMINDER: Sweet Software Group Training in Ankeny, IA Next Week
We're looking forward to seeing you next week for our Sweet Software Group Training. If you have questions or if there is anything we can do to make this a better experience for you, please contact us at:
Kathy Swanson, Ankeny Fire Department: (515) 965-6476 | kswanson@ankenyiowa.gov
Brenda Taylor, TriTech Sales Representative: (800) 537-3927 ext. 6233 | brenda.taylor@tritech.com
Here is a link to download a copy of the agenda, if you'd like: <http://www.tritechems.com/documents/_UG/Sample_2-day_Group_Training_agenda.pdf" target="_blank>.
Registration will begin on the first day at 7:45 a.m. We sincerely hope that these two days of education will allow everyone to gain knowledge in the areas desired. Although this is classroom-style training, feel free to bring a laptop if you have access to one and you will be able to participate in some “hands-on” activities.
We invite you to dress casually and comfortably for the session. Since room temperatures and preferences vary from person to person, please bring a sweater or sweatshirt to wear if needed.
See you next week!
________________________________________ Sweet Software Group Training in Ankeny, IA on April 24-25, 2012
TRAINING LOCATION: Ankeny Fire Station #1 (120 NW Ash Dr., Ankeny, IA 50023)
RECOMMENDED HOTEL: Courtyard by Marriott 2405 Southeast Creekview Drive, Ankeny, IA 50021) Phone: (515) 422-555 | $139-189 per night plus tax
